title: Rishi Sunak hints at more help with rising cost of living
content:
1. Rishi Sunak hints at more help with rising cost of living  BBC
  2. UK hits oil and gas companies with $6 billion windfall tax  CNN
  3. Sunak appears to be back in 'whatever it takes' mode  BBC
  4. Sunak’s package fails to tackle the true cause of UK inflation: shameless profiteering  The Guardian
  5. UK slaps one-off tax on oil and gas giants to ease the pain of soaring household energy bills  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
